channel.title: Need help on this one thing
channel.description:
Hello there, this is my nooby account so i will get right to it. I'm an experienced coder looking for a coding partner in my new server Cerberus. Cerberus is very well coded all ready however it's no fun coding it on your own. [u][b]A 24/7 hoster has been found[/b][/u] and a site has already been made. Now all i need is a fellow coder.. [i]Interested?[/i] Contact my email: [u][b]hani-rules@hotmail.co.uk[/b][/u]
[size=11pt]Bear in mind if making an application; must be experienced in Javascript. Specifically Devolution V7 based sources.[/size]
[size=12pt][u]Current server features:[/u][/size] [b]Incredible stability, can hold 200+ players. Full herblore with working potions. (Thanks to 'Rich) Full slayer tower. All item requirements. Player facing NPC's All NPC's currently move. Quest Handler 98% Mining. Started Castlewars. Barrows (could be improved). Anti SYI (Removed thread per client). Anti Dupe. Anti Cheat/Hax command. Woodcutting works. Fletching works. Working Caskets. Smithing works. Working Energy. Tzharr Caves.[/b]
[size=12pt][u]What i plan to have added:[/u][/size] [b]Full Castlewars Full Fight caves and Tzok Jad minigame. Full Pest Controll. Improved Fishing. and many more things.[/b].
Again my email is: [u][b]hani-rules@hotmail.co.uk[/b][/u]

item.title: Need help on this one thing
item.dc:creator: @Z0D14C Z0D14C
item.description:
@Z0D14C wrote:

I dont use Delta! Your right it’s too much overused. This source is original and was programmed by me of the original Devolution V6.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2009, 09:50:33 am[/size][hr]Plus if i dont know how to code how come i added all those features myself? I personally think it’s boring coding a server on your
own but hey… what would you know you dont get much human contact do you?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on this one thing

item.title: Need help on this one thing
item.dc:creator: @xAcid_Tripx xAcid Tripx
item.description:
@xAcid_Tripx wrote:

Do you need a full time moderator for your server? I’m not experianced in java coding but i’d say i’m really good with players. Finding proper moderators is kinda’ tough these days anyways, Need some help? Because i’d be glad, i can also Beta Test

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on this one thing

item.title: Need help on this one thing
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

lol? delta has most of the things u wanted to add andi dont think you are aloud to do this.

  1. you just want a helper just because you dont even know how to code.
  2. you would code it yourself to learn more.

Read full topic
